questiontext.text:
Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}9 &-2 &9 \\3 &-1 &-9 \\4 &-4 &1\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-7.0578:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=3.7708:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=12.2869:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}9 &-5 &-10 \\-9 &8 &-2 \\-8 &4 &-4\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-7.8435:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=2.7977:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=18.0458:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-17:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-4.4372:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=7.4372:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}
